item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 1, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple Acquires Pixelmator (285 points | 130 comments)
2. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (November 2024) (109 points | 100 comments)
3. Alexander the Great's tunic identified in royal tomb at Vergina (166 points | 84 comments)
4. TokenFormer: Rethinking Transformer Scaling with Tokenized Model Parameters (58 points | 5 comments)
5. Ink: React for Interactive CLI Apps (48 points | 28 comments)
6. ChatGPT Search (1380 points | 1143 comments)
7. Notes for an Annotation SDK (2021) (8 points | discuss)
8. An Update on Apple M1/M2 GPU Drivers (549 points | 214 comments)
9. Show HN: Ratarmount 1.0.0 – Rapid access to large archives via a FUSE filesystem (27 points | 1 comment)
10. The 1600s Were a Watershed for Swear Words (2022) (40 points | 27 comments)
11. 34x34x34 Rubik's Cube (143 points | 63 comments)
12. Make It Yourself (34 points | 8 comments)
13. Oasis: A Universe in a Transformer (106 points | 35 comments)
14. Iceberg A-68: The story of how a mega-berg transformed the ocean (6 points | discuss)
15. Universe would die before monkey with keyboard writes Shakespeare, study finds (70 points | 126 comments)
16. Embeddings are underrated (219 points | 103 comments)
17. A new dental scam is to pull healthy teeth to sell you expensive fake ones (170 points | 165 comments)
18. The Dual Nature of Events in Event-Driven Architecture (17 points | 7 comments)
19. Throbac: THrifty Roman numeral BAckwards-looking Computer (5 points | 5 comments)
20. Using the Strangler Fig with Mobile Apps (36 points | 10 comments)
21. NandGame – Build a computer from scratch (298 points | 46 comments)
22. Hazel: A live functional programming environment featuring typed holes (210 points | 67 comments)
23. Pythagora (GPT Pilot) (YC W24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
24. Debugging Compiled Code for R with Positron (8 points | 3 comments)
25. Iconic Gun-Makers Gave Sensitive Customer Information to Political Operatives (27 points | 4 comments)
26. Food Colorants Before Aniline Dyes (1991) [pdf] (24 points | 8 comments)
27. CIL: C Intermediate Language (65 points | 25 comments)
28. Demystifying the regular expression that checks if a number is prime (2016) (120 points | 35 comments)
29. What is the point of an online conference? (125 points | 82 comments)
30. Democratising publishing (156 points | 40 comments)
